subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|又|又|ls=ic|t1=hand|t2=hand}} – two hands meeting in friendship. Also {{liushu|psc|nocap=1|adj=y}}, from {{och-l|又}}.
